vialab.SMT.util

Class TouchBinder

  • java.lang.Object
    • vialab.SMT.util.TouchBinder
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ActiveDisplayTouchBinder, DisplayTouchBinder, RectTouchBinder, ScreenTouchBinder, SketchTouchBinder

    public class TouchBinder
extends java.lang.Object
    Just a little class for describing how to map ([0,1], [0,1]) tuio coordinates onto ([0,applet.width], [0,applet.height]) touch coordinates.

      • bind

        public processing.core.PVector bind(float x,
                                    float y)
        Binds the x and y components into
        Parameters:
        x - The x coordinate in [0,1] space to bind onto [0,applet.width] space
        y - The y coordinate in [0,1] space to bind onto [0,applet.height] space

      • update

        public void update()
        Update this touch binder.

        Set the bind matrix for this touch binder
        Parameters:
        matrix - the desired bind matrix

      • setClampMin

        public void setClampMin(processing.core.PVector min)
        Set the minimum desired values of x and y coordinates.
        Parameters:
        min - the desired lower clamping bound of x and y coordinates

      • setClampMax

        public void setClampMax(processing.core.PVector max)
        Set the maximum desired values of x and y coordinates.
        Parameters:
        max - the desired upper clamping bound of x and y coordinates

      • setDebug

        public void setDebug(boolean enabled)
        Enables or disabled debug console output for this touch binder
        Parameters:
        enabled - whether debug messages should be enabled or not.
